name: CellAdapterX
description:
CONTROLS

Hold [Left Mouse Button] - rotate
Hold [Right Mouse Button] - rotate in an opposite way
Hold [A] - turn RED
Hold [S] - turn GREEN
Hold [D] - turn BLUE

RULES

RED emits DAMAGE
GREEN emits FOOD

RED eats FOOD
GREEN is vulnerable to DAMAGE
BLUE eats DAMAGE

GREEN generates its own energy
RED and BLUE do not

AI

Every half a second the AI will try to adapt to your behavior by minimizing harm to the enemies, maximizing harm to you and maximizing the enemy unit color diversity.

UI

Top left is current score. Top right is highscore.

Desktop-only.
